name: Solitaire 2G
description:
This solitaire game is a little different from the classic solitaire, no need to rack your brain, enjoy it and you're going to love it.

- 4 leaderboards for world ranking
- Unlimited undo and hints
- Auto complete
- Statistics
- Select your own photo as background
- Winning Streak Record
- Add 30+ patterns of poker backside
- Add 2 patterns of poker face
- sync Game Center data among devices
